name: Bee Sting
instructions:
1. Add the Bärenjäger, Laphroaig, Fernet-Branca, egg white and tangerine juice into a shaker and vigorously dry-shake (without ice).
2. Fill with ice and shake again until well-chilled.
3. Double-strain into an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.
4. Top with the bitters.
description: Scotch, honey and herbal liqueurs come together in this unconventional drink from bartender Jonathan Pogash.

ingredients.name: Islay Scotch Whiskey
ingredients.description:
Islay Scotch refers to Scotch whisky that is produced on the Isle of Islay, which is one of the whisky-producing regions of Scotland. Islay whiskies are renowned for their distinctive and peaty character, often featuring robust and smoky flavors that set them apart from whiskies produced in other regions.

Well-known Islay distilleries include Ardbeg, Laphroaig, Lagavulin, and Bowmore, among others. Islay Scotch whiskies are appreciated by enthusiasts who enjoy the bold and distinctive flavor profile associated with the region. They are often enjoyed neat or with a splash of water to unlock the complexities of the spirit.

ingredients.name: Fernet Branca
ingredients.description: Fernet Branca is a bittersweet, herbal liqueur made with a number of different herbs and spices, including myrrh, rhubarb, chamomile, cardamom, aloe, and gentian root.

ingredients.name: Egg White
ingredients.description: Egg white is the clear liquid part of an egg that surrounds the yolk. It is rich in proteins and is commonly used in cooking and baking for its ability to add structure, foam, and a smooth texture to various dishes.

ingredients.name: Peychauds Bitters
ingredients.description: It is a gentian-based bitters, comparable to Angostura bitters, but with a predominant anise aroma combined with a background of mint.
